__e: My little brother says she'll be gone for a few days.

But yesterday you didn't want to go home since your family left.
The day that Danny went missing, you, your mom, your brother, you guys were out of town,
Where are you going with her and not me?
Your parents are out of town for the weekend.
I don't know if I can stop by because my parents are travelling and won't be back until next week.

She's on a trip and what she don't know won't hurt her.
